frontmatter.title: Get difficult sh*t done with a hackday

node.excerpt: Cut to the end of the day. The people around you have had the most productive day in weeks. You’ve got shit done, and everyone knows where…
The first rule is: do it as a team. Not just your immediate user-centred design colleagues either. You need 4–8 people per experiment—so…
